评论概述: An affordable minimalist wallet, the Holdsmith Gear Minimalist Wallet will fit your bill
类型: Color: Ribbed Orange Matte TextureStyle: Ribbed Texture (Rt)
评论详情: I wanted a minimalist wallet primarily for when the family and I went to do activities where my massive trifold 'dad wallet' was overkill.  I don't need my Sams Club Membership card, cash, various gift club rewards cards, blood donor card, or employee ID badge when I'm out riding roller coasters with my kids, hiking trails to the waterfalls, or I'm out for a motorcycle ride to nowhere.  I decided to give one of these Holdsmith minimalist wallets a try.  What drew me to order?  1) price was reasonable, 2) plastic, I didn't want a metal one scratching up my phone when I need to keep them both in the same pocket, 3) Color choice, I wanted something bright to stick out in case I set it down or it fell out of my pocket, 4) It would hold the my ID and credit card SNUG - and it DOES! and 5) It had to be as small as possible - the whole point of it being 'minimalist'.  It also get bonus points for being made in the USA, having some grippy ribs molded in so I my sweaty hands don't drop it after a hike or ride, and kinda sorta matches my bike if you squint hard enough.  I haven't had it for long, but the plastic seems durable enough to last awhile, so I don't think I'll have to use that Lifetime Warranty.

类型: Color: Shiny Black Polished Smooth SurfaceStyle: Polished Smooth Surface (Ps)
评论详情: I've been using a wallet similar to the Ridge wallet, which is very popular these days and it works great. The only thing I don't like is sometimes the money clip and even the corners can poke your bum if it's positioned weird in your pocket. I know they are supposed to be front pocket wallets, but I just have a habit of putting it in my back pocket. I came across the Holdsmith wallet and gave it a shot - particularly based on a photo of cash going inside the wallet.  This things weighs next to nothing, but it doesn't feel flimsy. I was a bit concerned about how much it could take being in my back pocket and being sat on - but so far no signs that it's not up to the task. I also like the "clamp" mechanism so it adjusts to how many cards you have in it and it really does hold them tightly! I have taken the wallet and slapped it against my hand to see if I can get the cards to fling out and they won't.  For price and functionality - I think this is a much better wallet that the Ridge-style wallets. I think the only thing that could be a question is durability...but so far, it is holding up very well to being sat on all day. I would highly recommend this wallet if you are looking for something minimal, lightweight, and something that won't break the bank.

类型: Color: Shiny Purple Polished Smooth SurfaceStyle: Polished Smooth Surface (Ps)
评论详情: I  needed a way to hold my ID, a credit card, insurance card, and a bit of cash while traveling since I didn't want to drag my whole wallet around. This is small but super secure because of the way it's constructed. It has a middle piece almost like a spring to keep a few cards from falling out. I was hesitant but it really works! I bought a bright color so I could find it easily and that was a good idea. I may try adding a lanyard or something to hang around my neck but this is small enough to fit in any pocket, purse or bag. Everyone needs on of these little gadgets.

评论概述: STURDY, LIGHTWEIGHT, COMPACT, SECURE; THIS MAKES MY LIFE SO MUCH SIMPLER
类型: Color: Ribbed Black Matte TextureStyle: Ribbed Texture (Rt)
评论详情: This minimalist wallet is an amazing product. It is crafted of sturdy polymer, can hold up to 8 cards, is easy to use, compact and secure, and appears quite durable. To use, simply slide your cards in. They fit perfectly and securely. To access your cards, simply press up on the bottom to slide them out. The design is such that they don't fall out. It measures about 2 3/8" W x 3 5/8" L. It is just shy of 1/2" thick.  For years I have had a traditional wallet, taking up too much space in my purse, making it difficult to locate exactly what cards I need, and time consuming to change from one purse to another. With this, I can easily and quickly move what I need from my regular purse to a dressy clutch purse, add my lipstick, phone and comb and I'm good to go. No time consuming sorting, misplaced credit or identification cards. This also easily fits in a pocket for an on the go lifestyle.  It comes in an array of vibrant colors and two different textures. This is an all around practical, well designed minimalist wallet for credit and identification cards. (BTW, It does not work for business cards.)  I recommend this product. Thanks for reading :)

评论详情: I upgraded to this from my old wallet, which I used for 15 years and held exactly two cards. Unfortunately, that just wasn't enough anymore as I need to carry a few additional cards for work. I'm not a fan of the minimal wallets that rely on elastic, as it always fails eventually.  Well, I switched to this wallet a few weeks ago and I love it. Everything stays in place even with just a few cards, but the cards still slide out easily thanks to the various cutouts. It doesn't bother me in my back pocket when I sit on it all day, and I like the look and feel of it. My only suggestion would be to add a small hole somewhere that you could thread a wrist strap or something similar through, for times when I want something a bit more secure to hold onto. I hope it lasts a long time, and I'll probably replace it with another of the same if it does break eventually.

类型: Color: Ribbed Brown Matte TextureStyle: Ribbed Texture (Rt)
评论详情: This sturdy plastic frame is about as simple as you get, but it's not the thinnest solution around.  Still, I appreciate the straightforward approach that requires no springs or other tricky mechanisms.  Your cards are simply pressed between some curved plastic braces (1 front, 2 back).  Whether it's a single card or multiple cards, they are suspended in the middle of the frame.  If you place your cards with the back towards the two braces, the signature area typically falls between them so you needn't worry about rubbing it off.  Cards have a bit of resistance putting them in, but after you pass the midway point they nicely click into place.  You pay very little in terms of weight versus other options, but the thickness is fixed.  Correspondingly, I'd go with a different approach if I had three cards or less.Overall I like it, but not for all occasions.  The stiff frame means pocket bulge and little flex.  Few cards will mean wasted space, and of course there's no RFID protection.  Bravo for being made in the USA though.
